name: Bouncy Hills 2
description:
For a technical test, I was asked to develop a game similar to Bouncy Hills in 4 days. I created this game where the character always rotates towards the floor and can shot eggs. 

How to play :

  • Touching the right side of the screen makes the character jump. 
  • Touching the right side of the screen while in the air makes the character shoot an egg. 
  • Touching the left side of the screen while in the air slows time making it easier to aim.
